job.title: Cloud Software Engineer

job.description: ltstronggtltugtrole and responsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtjob title cloud software engineer job id as job location arlington tx job description software engineer will assist in the design and support of advanced cloud network solutions responsibilities include collaboration on design and development of cybersecure cloud infrastructures and managing offpremise computational resources excellent opportunity to learn advanced concepts from and work with senior level engineers who are pioneering novel solutions in the field of cloud computing qualifications bachelors degree and two years of work experience in technical field such as cs ce swe must be able to obtain a secret clearance must understand basic networking and have a desire to learn more candidate should be selfmotivated and possess the ability to collaborate effectively with teams to diagnose and troubleshoot issues candidate should be a selfstarter with strong organization skills preferred additional skills possess cloud based architecture experience writing apps for any cloud is a positive but not a requirement familiarity with redhat enterprise linux windows system administration and operation working knowledge of virtualization vmware working knowledge of networking concepts protocols software hardware experience with scripting and automation toolsansible packer terraform desired but not required experience with continuous integrationcontinuous development toolsgit jenkins bamboo docker kubernetes troubleshooting experience problem solver
